rows.name: Ask Ciska about flight conditions on Mira.

rows.label: tev021101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev021101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ciska about recent developments.

rows.label: tev021101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Ciska about recent developments.

rows.label: tev021101_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Ciska about flight conditions on Mira.

rows.label: tev021101_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Ciska about recent developments.

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Besides the abnormal weather, unusual kinds of
electromagnetic waves are abundant in the skies
of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Radar systems that were designed for use on Earth
go haywire as soon as we start them up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0003
rows.name:
So without an extremely skilled pilot, even a perfectly
maintained helicopter is going to crash shortly after
takeoff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Of course when you're as good as I am, it's no big
deal. I don't even need radar—intuition is enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0010
rows.name:
We got another request from the Grenada Galactic
Group, and I'm raring to get started on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0011
rows.name:
But Howard always says, "Until your preparations are
flawless, you're not going anywhere."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Howard is an obsessive perfectionist, and it makes
it impossible to finish anything around here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0013
rows.name:
How I wish I could have teamed up with a nice
respectable BLADE like you instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Roscoe's always ordering me to get along with
Howard, but you can't just make a decree like that
and expect anything to change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Earlier, my BLADE friend Anna and I were talking
about how great it would be to go to a spa together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0021
rows.name:
But New LA doesn't have a single one, which seems
nuts. I mean, we have bars, right? And spas are way
more important than some stupid drunk hole![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Plus, if they DID ever build some kind of spa in the
commercial district, Anna and I would go there
preeetty much every day, which helps the economy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1001
rows.name:
Besides the abnormal weather, unusual kinds of
electromagnetic waves are abundant in the skies
of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1002
rows.name:
Radar systems that were designed for use on Earth
go haywire as soon as we start them up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1003
rows.name:
So you have to pay extremely close attention to every
little detail when it comes to keeping a helicopter up
in the air. I knew that, and yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1010
rows.name:
Before missions, Howard always ordered me to fix
anything that was even slightly scuffed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1011
rows.name:
Otherwise, he'd say, you never know what might go
wrong. He yelled at me about that sort of thing so
many times...and I always fought him on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1012
rows.name:
But Howard was right. This happened because I always
let the little things slide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1013
rows.name:
I want so badly to apologize to him—to tell him I'm
sorry for refusing to learn the lesson he was trying
so desperately to teach me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021101_MSG1014
rows.name:
But it's too late. All I can do now is live his lesson
so that his efforts aren't wasted.[ST:wait ]
